name: Frozen Mystery
description: Frozen Mystery is a Christmas puzzle that will help you to relax, immerse yourself in the festive atmosphere and at the same time train your brains!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
